    • Method Detail

      • host

        ClassifierOptions host​(java.lang.String host)
        Parameters:
        host - Hostname of the classifier service.

      • http

        ClassifierOptions http()
        Specifies the use of HTTP instead of HTTPS for the classifier service.

      • port

        ClassifierOptions port​(int port)
        Parameters:
        port - Port number of the classifier service.

      • path

        ClassifierOptions path​(java.lang.String path)
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the classifier service.

      • apiKey

        ClassifierOptions apiKey​(java.lang.String apiKey)
        Parameters:
        apiKey - API key granting access to the classifier service when hosted in Progress Data Cloud.

      • tokenPath

        ClassifierOptions tokenPath​(java.lang.String tokenPath)
        Parameters:
        tokenPath - Path of the token generator for the classifier service when hosted in Progress Data Cloud.

      • batchSize

        ClassifierOptions batchSize​(int batchSize)
        Parameters:
        batchSize - Number of documents and/or chunks of text to send to the classifier service in a single request.

      • additionalOptions

        ClassifierOptions additionalOptions​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> additionalOptions)
        Parameters:
        additionalOptions - Additional options for configuring the behavior of the classifier service.
